original_text: Yes, all of you are robbing me. The whole nation of Israel is guilty. So you will receive the punishment of a curse.
korean_text: 너희 곧 온 나라가 나의 것을 도둑질하였으므로 너희가 저주를 받았느니라

sentences.original_text: Yes, all of you are robbing me.
sentences.korean_translation: 네, 너희 모두가 나를 훔치고 있다.

sentences.original_text: The whole nation of Israel is guilty.
So you will receive the punishment of a curse.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 너희는 저주의 형벌을 받을 것이다.
